data.text:
Drew Sidora | Bio, Age, Net Worth, Relationship, Career

American actress, producer, and singer Drew Sidora made her screen debut in the television film Divas in 1995. She has received praise for her performances in Step Up, Wild Hogs, White Chicks, and Never Die Alone.

What is the Net Worth of Drew Sidora? Salary, Earnings

Hollywood actress Sidora makes her living primarily from her acting career. As of 2024, the Step Up actressâs net worth is estimated by Celebrity Net Worth to be $1.5 million.

Her riches have also been aided by the positive reviews for her films. One of her best-selling movies, Never Die Alone, brought in $5,923,000 at the box office.

She played the role of Haley Davis in the motorcycle road comedy âWild Hogs.â With a $60 million budget, the film made $253.6 million at the box office worldwide.

Where was Drew Sidora born? Ethnicity, Nationality, Family, Education

The full name of Drew Sidora is Drew Sidora Pittman. On May 1, 1985, in Chicago, Illinois, she was born under the sign of Taurus in the United States. She is an American citizen and a member of the white ethnic group. She has not disclosed her family members. In terms of schooling, Sidora went to Rich Central High School.

Quick Facts

Date of Birth:1985, May-1 Age:36 years old Birth Nation:United States of America Height:5 Feet 4 InchNameDrew SidoraBirth NameDrew Sidora JordanNick NameDrew SidoraNationalityAmericanBirth Place/CityChicagoReligionChristianityEye ColorbrownHair ColorblackBody Measurements38-24-36Breast Size34DDWaist size24 inchesHip Size36 inchesWeight in KG52Famous foracting and singingMarriedyesMarried toRalph PittmanChildren3MoviesWild Hogs, step upAlbumsstep up

Is Drew Sidora Married? Relationship

Drew Sidoraâs actress relationship status indicates that she is wed to Ralph Pittman. She exchanged vows with her spouse on August 21, 2014.

Together, the couple has two kids. They welcomed their baby Machai David Pittman into the world on June 30, 2015, at 3:38 a.m. Their first kid was born seven weeks ahead of schedule, following three weeks of hospitalization.

He was four pounds in weight. He was 16.5 inches long and weighed 4.5 ounces at birth. The couple completed their family on February 14, 2018, when their daughter Aniya Grace Pittman was born.

How did Drew Sidora start her Professional Career?

At the age of two, Drew began taking music and acting lessons. At nine years old, she starred in the Fox TV film Divas with Nicole Ari Parker, Lisa Nicole Carson, and Khalil Kain.

The 36-year-old then starred in the 2004 release of Ernest R. Dickersonâs crime thriller Never Die Alone. She subsequently came to notice for her recurring role as Chantel in the renowned supernatural teen drama âThatâs So Ravenâ on the Disney Channel.

Sidora is well-known for her parts in motion pictures like CrazySexyCool: The TLC Story and Step Up. She started her singing career in 2006, aside from that. She sang two songs, âFor The Loveâ and âTil The Dawn,â on the Set Up in 2006.

In addition, she has sung on other songs, such as âThree Can Playâ and âGive It Up Two Me.â In 2022, she will play the lead role in the movie Line Sisters.

The Wild Hogs actress was dating her ex-boyfriend before Pittman. Josiah, her son, was born on March 21, 2011, as well. Sadly, the couple broke up for an unidentified reason.
